prompt: Design a retro-inspired 404 Not Found page with vintage purple and pink color scheme. Create a nostalgic gradient background from light purple (Colors.purple[100]) to soft pink (Colors.pink[100]). Feature a bold '404' in deep purple (Colors.purple[800]) with extra bold font weight and subtle letter spacing for retro appeal. Display 'Error Detected' as a computer-age subtitle in the same purple. Add a retro-tech message 'System malfunction detected! The requested file has been corrupted or moved to another dimension. Please reboot your navigation.' in dark gray. Include a vintage-style 'Reboot System' button with purple background, slightly rounded corners, and moderate elevation. Use classic spacing with SizedBox heights of 14, 20, 28, and 36 pixels. Apply padding of 25.0 for a nostalgic, well-proportioned layout reminiscent of early computing interfaces.
